name: Ext_R4_MedicationRequest_reported
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicationRequest.reported[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.reported[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Indicates if this record was captured as a secondary 'reported' record rather than as an original primary source-of-truth record.  It may also indicate the source of the report.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.reported[x]` maps to R5 `MedicationRequest.reported`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Patient)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Practitioner)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PractitionerRole)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
